text: We don’t have multiple languages, but our main language is Swedish. However, the blog subscribe module submit button is still in English. How can we fix this?
I can’t see any way to pass a new value to the submit button in the `blog_subscribe` module either?
There will be form in form section for blog subscription and you can change the button content there.
Under "Options" from the form edit screen, you can choose the Form and error message language.
